projects.category: A place to share your thoughts
projects.title: BlogStone ‚úçÔ∏è
projects.description: A personal blogspace crafted from scratch. Using React, Node and Postgresql users can create an account and access a fully capable CRUD app to post what's on their mind. Front-end and Back-end github links are below.

projects.category: Share and find skate spots in your area
projects.title: üõπ SpotIt
projects.description: SpotIt was built with Python, utilizing GoogleMap API's. It's built for the skateboard community to be able to locate and/or share skatespots that previously could only be found via word of mouth. Users can easily add/edit/remove spots or find new locations with directions.
